alert.note: Alert for Irion; Schleicher; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN SCHLEICHER...SOUTH CENTRAL TOM GREEN AND SOUTHEASTERN IRION COUNTIES THROUGH 800 AM CDT... At 714 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of The Intersection Of Us- 190 And Ranch Road 2084, or 12 miles northeast of Eldorado, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... The Intersection Of Ranch Road 1828 And Ranch Road 915. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
